title: How can i post a screen?
body:
Yo
I always get in teams where people are gonna to troll, int, afk etc.
So i thought why not screenshot this and send it to the forums.

Only the problem is i cannot find the button where it said where i can upload it

can someone help ?

replies.body:
It wouldn't be best to post those screenshots here, as there's not a lot we can personally do from the boards. Your best bet is to hit that report button in the post game lobby, but if you can't shoot those screenshots our way in a ticket. 

With that being said, you can post images here by using the image url.
